Html:
Well,tried in 3 diferent machines,all do the same,it gets to 4%,and CPU usage goes to 100% and rawr just stops,always on "Stylin purple hat" item.I have to ctrl+alt+del and close rawr,i left the program run for 15/20 minutes to see if it resumes,but no luck.
If i change the optimizer settings to ->Simulated Annealing,this error disapeer.
Help? ;)
Can you open a ticket in the issue tracker and upload your character file?
This seems to be a bug with the optimizer. Removing enchants from your character or enabling them for optimizations fixes the issue.

That was fast!! :D
If you guys need anything more from me to fix the bug,just ask ;)
